subject: America's Cup
Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: The exclusive St. Francis Yacht Club has a history of winning every major sailing race, except the biggest one, which was won by its less-distinguished neighbor, the Golden Gate Yacht Club.
snippet: The exclusive St. Francis Yacht Club has a history of winning every major sailing race, except the biggest one, which was won by its less-distinguished neighbor, the Golden Gate Yacht Club.
